name: Calabrio
description: Calabrio is a customer engagement software company that provides analytic insights to catalyze growth through customer service contact centers. Calabrio ONEÂ® is a unified suite including call recording, quality management, workforce management and voice-of-the-customer analytics that records, captures and analyzes customer engagement center interactions to improve the customer experience and drive top-line business growth. The suite can be deployed in the cloud, on-premises or via hybrid.
